sentences.sentence: They will not be able to spend a single day without masturbation, and will probably want to have a go at it whenever they can afford.
sentences.translation: 上瘾者一天不进行都难以忍受，并可能在身体无法承受的时候也想要尝试，这自然会导你无法专心工作。

sentences.sentence: This is a rumor-filled society and if people want to sit around and talk about whom I've dated, then I'd say they have a lot of spare time and should consider other topics… or masturbation.
sentences.translation: 如今的人太喜欢八卦了，他们居然有闲心八卦我跟谁约会，要是真有这么多时间的话，为嘛不讨论点别的话题……太闲的话去打手枪好了。
